* Defines a sorter that is responsible for sorting the activities
     * based on the provided historical choices and an intent.

methods.name: public void sort(Intent intent, List<ActivityResolveInfo> activities, List<HistoricalRecord> historicalRecords)
methods.comment: is computed from history. Note that Activity implements Comparable.
